review_blob: This beer absolutely stands up to the hype. Completely black in color, aromas of caramel and vanilla are intense. It is incredibly smooth to drink, rich in flavor, with an almost creamy texture. By far the best bourbon stout I've ever experienced.
Very smoky, dark porter. While smoky in taste, it's incredibly smooth and drinkable for even the softest of drinkers. I'd recommend pairing with barbecue, steak, or chocolate cake.
Smooth, yet delicious chocolatey and peanut butter flavor. Easy to drink and exceptionally flavorful on the palette. Would be best served as a dessert beverage
